description: The devilish Il is the first of Utau`s two Character Guardians introduced in the story. Il is mean and unkind, but dislikes nagging. She represents Utau`s energetic and playful side. During Character Transformation, Utau becomes Lunatic Charm, with the attack Nightmare Lorelei and later, Dream Trident. When Il felt lonely because El wasn`t there for her to tease and when she felt that Utau was ignoring her because of Diamond, she Character Transforms with Amu, becoming Amulet Devil.
name: Il
